lemma validity_argument: assumes run: "SHORun Ute_M rho HOs SHOs" and comm: "\<forall>r. SHOcommPerRd Ute_M (HOs r) (SHOs r)" and init: "\<forall>p. x ((rho 0) p) = v" and dw: "decide (rho r p) = Some w" and stp: "step r' = Suc 0" shows "card {q. sendMsg Ute_M r' q p (rho r' q) = Vote (Some v)} > E - \<alpha>"
